Translations.Text: yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha qum'tum ila l-salati fa-igh'silu wujuhakum wa-aydiyakum ila l-marafiqi wa-im'sahu biruusikum wa-arjulakum ila l-kaʿbayni wa-in kuntum junuban fa-ittahharu wa-in kuntum marda aw ʿala safarin aw jaa ahadun minkum mina l-ghaiti aw lamastumu l-nisaa falam tajidu maan fatayammamu saʿidan tayyiban fa-im'sahu biwujuhikum wa-aydikum min'hu ma yuridu l-lahu liyajʿala ʿalaykum min harajin walakin yuridu liyutahhirakum waliyutimma niʿ'matahu ʿalaykum laʿallakum tashkuruna
wa-udh'kuru niʿ'mata l-lahi ʿalaykum wamithaqahu alladhi wathaqakum bihi idh qul'tum samiʿ'na wa-ataʿna wa-ittaqu l-laha inna l-laha ʿalimun bidhati l-suduri

yaayyuha alladhina amanu kunu qawwamina lillahi shuhadaa bil-qis'ti wala yajrimannakum shanaanu qawmin ʿala alla taʿdilu iʿ'dilu huwa aqrabu lilttaqwa wa-ittaqu l-laha inna l-laha khabirun bima taʿmaluna
waʿada l-lahu alladhina amanu waʿamilu l-salihati lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun ʿazimun
wa-alladhina kafaru wakadhabu biayatina ulaika ashabu l-jahimi
